Knowing the final state \\( z(T) \\), can we determine whether both Fourier and inverse Fourier transforms were applied or neither based only on \\( z(T) \\)?
Explanation: Given the nature of Fourier transforms affecting frequency domains and potential phase alterations, multiple transformation sequences could yield the same endpoint \\( z(T) \\). These transformations may not necessarily be uniquely deducible from the final state due to the complexities introduced by the inherent properties of Fourier-related operations.
